title: "Empty 'XFP' files"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
library(ijtiff)
```

```{r}
xfp_path <- "../data/image_samples_x/BF_Position001.tif"

xfp <- ijtiff::read_tif(xfp_path)

dim(xfp)
```

```{r}
xfp_path <- "../data/image_samples_x/XFP_Position001.tif"

xfp <- ijtiff::read_tif(xfp_path)
```
```{r}
xfp[,,,] <- rbinom(n = prod(dim(xfp[,,,])), size = 10, prob = .5)

xfp

ijtiff::write_tif(xfp, xfp_path, overwrite = T, bits_per_sample = attributes(xfp)$bits_per_sample)
```

```{r}
xfp[,,,] %>% as.vector() %>% unique()
```
